mapper.select: select a.id, to_char(a.created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, a.created_id, concat(coalesce(b.last_name,''),coalesce(b.first_name,'')) as created_name, to_char(a.modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, a.modified_id, concat(coalesce(c.last_name,''),coalesce(c.first_name,'')) as modified_name, a.status, a.voca_lang_code, a.voca_lang_name, a.voca_lang_translation_code, a.voca_lang_sort from internal_exams_duolingo_voca_lang a left join auth_user b on a.created_id = b.id left join auth_user c on a.modified_id = c.id order by a.voca_lang_sort
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_duolingo_voca_lang ( created, created_id, modified, modified_id, status, voca_lang_code, voca_lang_name, voca_lang_translation_code, voca_lang_sort ) values ( now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{modified_id}, #{status}, #{voca_lang_code}, #{voca_lang_name}, #{voca_lang_translation_code}, #{voca_lang_sort} )
mapper.update: update internal_exams_duolingo_voca_lang set modified = now(), modified_id = #{modified_id}, status = #{status}, voca_lang_code = #{voca_lang_code}, voca_lang_name = #{voca_lang_name}, voca_lang_translation_code = #{voca_lang_translation_code}, voca_lang_sort = #{voca_lang_sort} where id = #{id}
